# Description

I am a PhD candidate at the Erasmus School of Social and Behavioural Sciences. My research focuses on the use of psychological insights for public policy (behavioural public policy). For this, I am part of the [Behavioural Insights Group Rotterdam](www.bigrotterdam.nl). In this group behavioural scientists like me work together with policy experts from the municipality of Rotterdam on case studies submitted by the municipality.   
I have experience with conducting field experiments and evaluation studies. In my research, I use both quantitative and qualitative methods.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot}

member_name <- "Malte Dewies"

  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c(all_of(special_skill), "open access", "reproducible analysis", "preregistration", "open source software", "data sharing", "data management"))
  
# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)
```
